sentences.sContent: Another interesting feature is the low chloride content, for glutamate is the chief anion.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another interesting feature is the low chloride content, for glutamate is the chief anion.
sentences.sCn: 另一有趣的特点是氯化物含量低，而谷氨酸是主要的阴离子。

sentences.sContent: Tiny releases of glutamate play an important role in the body, but any excess can be dangerous - especially to the brain and nervous system.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tiny releases of glutamate play an important role in the body, but any excess can be dangerous - especially to the brain and nervous system.
sentences.sCn: 微量的谷氨酸释放在身体扮演一个重要角色，但是任何一点过量都是危险的，特别是对脑子和神经系统。

phrases.pCn: 味精（主要成分是谷氨酸一钠）
